description: Installation d'une rampe d'accès à la cour du 1G à l'établissement Archambault Médium situé dans le quartier Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines. Le projet consiste  en la fabrication et l'installation d'une rampe d'accès pour les personnes à mobilité réduite dans l'Système correctionnel du Canada. Le but est de faire des mise à niveau de modifications de clôtures, installation automatique, et femme des le concessionaire met à disposition l'équipement nécessaires afin de terminer les travaux dans les vingt semaines à commencer du statut d'acceptation de l'entreprise qui remporte cette poste.

full_summary:
====================================

### Installation of an Access Ramp to the 1G Courtyard

**Contract Number:** 21301-24-4625284
**Publication Date:** January 15, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** March 15, 2024, 14:00:00

**Project Overview:**

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) requires a general contractor to supply, labor, equipment, and materials to install an access ramp in the 1G courtyard at the Archambault Medium establishment.

**Objective:**

The purpose of this project is to provide safe access to residents with reduced mobility in the courtyard.

**Solution Requirements:**

* Supply and install a galvanized steel access ramp
* Modify fences and install piles to facilitate access
* Ensure equipment is transportable to the site from within the building

**Project Timeline:**

* Construction Time: Twenty (20) weeks from the date of notification of acceptance
* Mandatory site visit to be conducted according to the bid solicitation document

**Eligibility and Selection Criteria:**

* The procurement is not subject to any set-asides for Aboriginal Suppliers
* Selection criteria: Lowest price bid
* Bidders must attend a mandatory site visit
* Documents may be submitted in either English or French

**Security Requirements:**
None

**Important Deadlines:**

* Tender Closing Date: March 15, 2024, 14:00:00
* Contract Start Date: February 29, 2024
* Contract End Date: July 19, 2024

**For Further Information:**

Contact Karine Clément, Contracting and Procurement Regional Officer, at (514) 235-8177 or karine.clement@csc-scc.gc.ca.

**Procurement Assistance Canada:**

Seminars are offered to businesses interested in learning how to sell goods and services to the Government of Canada.
